items.sentence: You ought to tell Tom that you're planning on taking pictures.
It isn't necessary to make a decision now about where to meet.
If I had known your telephone number, I would have called you.
You are way too intelligent to think you'd be smarter than me.
Our electricity was cut off because we forgot to pay the bill.
My back hurts from sitting for hours in front of the computer.
Tom said he was sorry that he'd hurt Mary's friend's feelings.
It takes a special kind of person to work in those conditions.
The length of days and the length of years hardly vary at all.
Tell me why you aren't planning on going to Australia with us.
